      • addLesson

        public Lesson addLesson​(java.lang.String currentUsername,
                        Lesson lesson)
        Specified by:
        addLesson in interface LessonService
        Parameters:
        currentUsername - username of current user (the user is teacher or admin)
        lesson - lesson that should be added
        Returns:
        added to database lesson
        Throws:
        IncorrectDataException - if id is set
        org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException - the current user is a teacher and another teacher is set to lesson
        IncorrectDataException - the current user is admin and teacher is not set to lesson

      • editLesson

        public Lesson editLesson​(java.lang.String currentUsername,
                         Lesson newLesson)
        Specified by:
        editLesson in interface LessonService
        Parameters:
        currentUsername - username of current user (the user is teacher or admin)
        newLesson - lesson entity with fields that should be changed
        Returns:
        edited lesson
        Throws:
        IncorrectDataException - if edited lesson id is not set
        org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException - if the current user is a teacher and another teacher is set to lesson
        IncorrectDataException - if schedule overlaps appear
        IncorrectDataException - if the lesson rating is edited

      • denyLesson

        public void denyLesson​(java.lang.String currentUsername,
                       java.lang.Long lessonId)
        Specified by:
        denyLesson in interface LessonService
        Parameters:
        currentUsername - username of current user (the user is a teacher or an admin)
        lessonId - id of the lesson that should be denied
        Throws:
        org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException - if the current user is a teacher and another teacher is set to lesson
        DenyLessonException - if the course is in progress, already denied or finished

      • deleteLesson

                         java.lang.Long lessonId)
        Specified by:
        deleteLesson in interface LessonService
        Parameters:
        currentUsername - username of current user (the user is a teacher or an admin)
        lessonId - id of the lesson that should be deleted
        Throws:
        org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException - if the current user is a teacher and another teacher is set to lesson
        DenyLessonException - if the lesson is in progress

      • subscribe

        public java.lang.Boolean subscribe​(java.lang.String currentUsername,
                                   java.lang.Long lessonId)
        Specified by:
        subscribe in interface LessonService
        Parameters:
        currentUsername - username of current user (the user is a student)
        lessonId - id of the lesson to which the student wants to subscribe
        Returns:
        boolean if the user successfully subscribed to the lesson
        Throws:
        LessonSubscriptionException - if the lesson is already in progress, finished or denied
        LessonSubscriptionException - if there are no free places left for the lesson
        LessonSubscriptionException - if there is some schedule overlap

        Parameters:
        currentUsername - username of current user (the user is a student)
        lessonId - id of the lesson which the student wants to unsubscribe
        Returns:
        boolean if the user successfully unsubscribed the lesson

                               java.lang.Long lessonId)
        Specified by:
